channel.title: Need help to get onto servers.... my comp says theire all ofline
channel.description: I really need help getting onto servers they just all dont work for me and im really getting pissed off (sorry for language) and its really really annoying. please help me anyone that knows how and specify what i have to download. thank you.

item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

thanks for your help i really appreciate it. Thanks :D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 08:16:01 AM[/size][hr]oh gr8 i clicked on it then theres more choices…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 08:17:28 AM[/size][hr]Windows Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Windows Offline Installation, Multi-language jre-6-windows-i586.exe 12.56 MB
Windows Online Installation, Multi-language jre-6-windows-i586-iftw.exe 361.63 KB

Linux Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Linux RPM in self-extracting file jre-6-linux-i586-rpm.bin 17.60 MB
Linux self-extracting file jre-6-linux-i586.bin 18.09 MB

Solaris SPARC Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Solaris SPARC 32-bit self-extracting file jre-6-solaris-sparc.sh 22.23 MB
Solaris SPARC 64-bit self-extracting file jre-6-solaris-sparcv9.sh 9.56 MB

Solaris x86 Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Solaris x86 self-extracting file jre-6-solaris-i586.sh 16.89 MB

Solaris x64 Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Solaris x64 self-extracting file jre-6-solaris-amd64.sh 6.13 MB

Linux x64 Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Linux x64 RPM in self-extracting file jre-6-linux-amd64-rpm.bin 16.73 MB
Linux x64 self-extracting file jre-6-linux-amd64.bin 17.14 MB

Windows x64 Platform - Java™ SE Runtime Environment 6

Windows x64 executable jre-6-windows-amd64.exe 12.85 MB
which one???

item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Legendz, what are you, dumb or something? Download Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 6. And legendz, he needs to download that, look at its description —The Java SE Runtime Environment (JRE) allows end-users to run Java applications

No problem.

JDK 6 with NetBeans 5.5? Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 6? JDK US DST Timezone Update Tool - 1.1.0? Java SE 6 Documentation? Java SE 6 JDK Source Code? Solaris OS Patches?
Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files 6 ?

item.title: Need help to get onto servers.... my comp says theire all ofline
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Do what legendz said, you can get it from here http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp and are you sure that every server uses same port? There is two most used ports and they’re 43594 and 5555. Moparscape clients default port is 43594 so you might need to change it. Or the people who run the servers might be using Hamachi (which totally sucks). If you want to download Hamachi you can get it from here www.hamachi.cc

Read full topic
